import { useContext } from "react" import CartContext from "../../context/CartContext" import classes from "./Cart.module.css" import Input from "../UI/Input" const CartItem = (props)=>{ const cartContext = useContext(CartContext) console.log(cartContext.meals) const cartItems =
    {cartContext.meals.map((item)=>{ console.log(item) return

  • {item.name}

    {item.price}

    • })}
} export default CartItem
